OCR_info.question_text: 계산 결과가 가장 작은 것에 $\bigcirc$표 하시오.  $ \begin{array}{c}\frac{7}{10} \div \frac{1}{10} \\ ()\end{array} $ $ \begin{array}{c}\frac{11}{25} \div \frac{1}{25} \\ () \\\end{array} $ $ \begin{array}{c}\frac{5}{13} \div \frac{1}{13} \\ () \\\end{array} $
